## sum() function

Sum two numbers

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function sum(a: number, b: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | number | a number to add |
|  b | number | a number to add a to |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

the sum of A plus B.
